shadow.field:
// Detectar si es un dispositivo m√≥vil
if (/Mobi|Android|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent)) {
 v3d.puzzles.procedures["pantalla_mobil"]();
} else {
 v3d.puzzles.procedures["pantalla_web"]();
}

app.controls.addEventListener("change", function () {
 var raycaster = new v3d.Raycaster();
 var downVector = new v3d.Vector3(0, -1, 0);
 var terreno = app.scene.getObjectByName("terreno_mesh");

 if (!terreno) return;

 raycaster.set(app.camera.position, downVector);
 var intersects = raycaster.intersectObject(terreno, true);

 if (intersects.length > 0) {40000
 var groundY = intersects[0].point.y + 5;
 if (app.camera.position.y < groundY) {
 
 app.camera.position.y = v3d.MathUtils.lerp(app.camera.position.y, groundY, 0.3);
 app.camera.updateMatrixWorld();
 }
 } else {
 var newHeight = app.camera.position.y + 500;
 app.camera.position.y = v3d.MathUtils.lerp(app.camera.position.y, newHeight, 0.3);
 app.camera.updateMatrixWorld();
 }
 
});

app.controls.addEventListener('change', function () {
 let cam = app.camera;

 // Centro del l√≠miteNew Tab
 let centerX = -23359.657404441412;
 let centerY = 42573.993287886326;
 let centerZ = 51673.99169030842;

 // Tama√±o del √°rea permitida
 let rangeX = 23000;
 let rangeY = 15000;
 let rangeZ = 23000;

 
 let prevX = cam.position.x;
 let prevY = cam.position.y;
 let prevZ = cam.position.z;


 // Restricciones de movimiento
 cam.position.x = Math.min(centerX + rangeX, Math.max(centerX - rangeX, cam.position.x));
 cam.position.y = Math.min(centerY + rangeY, Math.max(centerY - rangeY, cam.position.y));
 cam.position.z = Math.min(centerZ + rangeZ, Math.max(centerZ - rangeZ, cam.position.z));


 if (cam.position.x !== prevX || cam.position.y !== prevY || cam.position.z !== prevZ) {
 proceso1(); // 
 }
});

// Define el proceso1
function proceso1() {
 console.log("La c√°mara toc√≥ el l√≠mite.");
 v3d.puzzles.procedures["home-camera"]();

}

// Verifica si ya existe
let btn = document.getElementById("verge-info-btn");
if (!btn) {
 btn = document.createElement("div");
 btn.id = "verge-info-btn";
 document.body.appendChild(btn);

 // Estilos base
 btn.style.position = "fixed";
 btn.style.top = "1.2rem";
 btn.style.right = "1.2rem";
 btn.style.width = "3.5rem";
 btn.style.height = "3.5rem";
 btn.style.borderRadius = "50%";
 btn.style.backgroundColor = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)";
 btn.style.boxShadow = "0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)";
 btn.style.display = "flex";
 btn.style.alignItems = "center";
 btn.style.justifyContent = "center";
 btn.style.cursor = "pointer";
 btn.style.zIndex = "9999";
 btn.style.transition = "transform 0.3s ease, background-color 0.3s ease";
 btn.style.opacity = "0";
 btn.style.transform = "scale(0.8)";
 btn.style.animation = "fadeInScale 1.8s ease forwards";

 // Imagen
 const img = document.createElement("img");
 img.src = "/images/equipo.png"; // Cambia a tu ruta real
 img.alt = "Ayuda";
 img.style.width = "2rem";
 img.style.height = "2rem";
 btn.appendChild(img);

 // Sonido
 const hoverSound = new Audio("/sounds/hover.mp3");

 btn.addEventListener("mouseenter", () => {
 hoverSound.currentTime = 0;
 hoverSound.play();
 btn.style.backgroundColor = "rgba(8, 167, 255, 0.8)";
 btn.style.transform = "scale(1.1)";
 });

 btn.addEventListener("mouseleave", () => {
 btn.style.backgroundColor = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)";
 btn.style.transform = "scale(1)";
 });

 btn.addEventListener("click", () => {
 console.log("Bot√≥n presionado");
 window.open('/images/ejemplo.pdf', 'popup', 'width=800,height=600');
 });

 // Agrega keyframes al documento si no est√°n
 if (!document.getElementById("verge-btn-animation-styles")) {
 const style = document.createElement("style");
 style.id = "verge-btn-animation-styles";
 style.innerHTML = `
 @keyframes fadeInScale {
 from { opacity: 0; transform: scale(0.8); }
 to { opacity: 1; transform: scale(1); }
 }
 @keyframes fadeOutScale {
 from { opacity: 1; transform: scale(1); }
 to { opacity: 0; transform: scale(0.8); }
 }
 `;
 document.head.appendChild(style);
 }
} else {
 // Si ya existe, reaparecer con animaci√≥n
 btn.style.display = "flex";
 btn.style.animation = "fadeInScale 0.4s ease forwards";
}

const btn = document.getElementById("verge-info-btn");
if (btn) {
 btn.style.animation = "fadeOutScale 1.8s ease forwards";
 setTimeout(() => {
 btn.style.display = "none";
 }, 400); // Espera a que termine la animaci√≥n
}
